comments.body:
Missed this before. This is not a great solution. The main problems I see is this environment is not getting cleaned up and an existing environment may be removed by using this strategy.

Would be better if we fixed issue ( https://github.com/conda/conda-build/issues/1059 ).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@cd %SRC_DIR%\test
conda env create -f .\test-environment.yml
activate test-xtensor
cmake -G "NMake Makefiles" -D CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=%LIBRARY_PREFIX% -D CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .
nmake
